org.libav.net.rtsp

Class SimpleAggregateMediaStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.net.rtsp.AbstractMediaStream
      • org.libav.net.rtsp.SimpleAggregateMediaStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAggregateMediaStream, IMediaStream

    public class SimpleAggregateMediaStream
extends AbstractMediaStream
implements IAggregateMediaStream
    Simple aggregate media stream. It provides methods to handle multiple single media streams.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka
